Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class ImageBallView

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.BallView
project.chenlin_17.Views.ImageBallView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
public class ImageBallView extends BallView
This image ball class is the concrete class extends from the ball class.
It creates the ball with set image. Note: It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.
Version:
Version2.0
update: Jan 3rd
Author:
Lin CHEN

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageBallView

      public ImageBallView(BallModel model, javafx.scene.image.Image image, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This constructor initializes the ball view.
      It sets the basic value for the ball setting variable by calling its parent class.
      Parameters:
      model - ball's model
      image - player set ball image
      group - ball's belonging world setting group
      See Also:
      • BallView(BallModel, Group)

  • Method Details

    • makeImageBall

      private void makeImageBall(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      This function helps adds the ball's image on the page.
      The ball's image position is closely combined with the ball center position's movement by calculation.
      Parameters:
      image - ball's image

    • makeBall

      protected javafx.scene.shape.Shape makeBall(BallModel model)
      This function implements the method defined in the parent class.
      It helps initializes the ball image view's position property and make tha ellipse ball face as well. Note: Double conversion is not needed in the javaFX API
      Specified by:
      makeBall in class BallView
      Parameters:
      model - ball model
      Returns:
      the built ball with center and specified radius

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(javafx.geometry.Point2D p)
      This function implements the method defined in the super class.
      It helps update and adjust the ball image's view by updating the property that stands for the image position.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:
      moveTo in class BallView
      Parameters:

    • updateProperty

      private void updateProperty(BallModel model)
      This is a helper function that sets the new image position property by getting the new center.
      Parameters:
      model - ball's new position
